function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Easily transmissible virus","Impact":"Rapid spread of the disease, overwhelming healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, government"},{"Description":"High infection to fatality ratio","Impact":"High mortality rate, particularly for older people and those with preexisting conditions","Mitigation":"Protection of vulnerable populations, expansion of healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Medical equipment, telehealth services","People":"Older population, people with preexisting conditions","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government"},{"Description":"Disruption of societal norms and governance","Impact":"Transformation of societal norms, disruption of global health governance","Mitigation":"Investment in disease preparedness, strengthening global health governance","Technologies":"Global health coordination platforms, public health information systems","People":"Global population, public health agencies","Owner":"International organizations, government"}]}
